name: circular-progress
author: ankitpokhrel08
preview: A beautiful circular progress indicator with percentage display, customizable colors, sizes, and smooth animations for modern web applications.

props.name: value
props.description: Progress value between 0 and 100 for determinate mode (default: 0)

props.name: indeterminate
props.description: Whether to show indeterminate loading animation (default: false)

props.name: showPercentage
props.description: Whether to display the percentage in the center (default: true)

props.name: animated
props.description: Whether to animate the progress (default: true)

props.name: duration
props.description: Duration of the animation in milliseconds (default: 1000)
